name: Lego Creator: Knights' Kingdom
summary:
Lego Creator: Knights' Kingdom is a construction simulation video game for Microsoft Windows; it uses virtual Lego pieces to build a medieval kingdom and then use the kingdom in a battle against the character Cedric the Bull. 
 
Gameplay[edit] 
Before the player can start creating a world, four challenges have to be completed. Each one consists of using different models and moving around the Lego world. There are also two challenges to do before new models can be build, which consists of working with different Lego bricks and putting them together into a model.
